markdown:
{{NPC infobox |game = poe2 |name = Kipeha |image = Portrait Kipeha Convo.png |image2 = PE2 Kipeha.png |caption = |race = Aumaua |subrace = Island |gender = Female |culture = [Deadfire Archipelago](/deadfireArchipelago/) |background = |faction = |deity = |personality = |class = |level = 1 |MIG = 16 |CON = 15 |DEX = 14 |PER = 10 |INT = 9 |RES = 12 |health = 2 |damage = 17-28 {{pierce}}{{slash}} |accuracy = 5 |penetration = 6 |deflection = 2 |fortitude = 22 |reflex = 8 |will = 2 |dr = 3 |ability = [Among the Waves](/amongTheWaves/) |location = [Ori o Koīki](/oriOKoiki/) |quests = [Fruitful Alliance](/fruitfulAlliance/)
[Tip of the Spear](/tipOfTheSpear/) |sells = Supplies, food, and ingredients |resting = yes |adventurers = |companion = |loot = |body = Kuaru Clothing |weapon1 = Hunting Bow (Deadfire){{!}}Hunting Bow |internalname = NPC_WI_Wahaki_Trader |guid = 39ddbe4b-96ae-44ea-b735-981028e36340 }} '''Kipeha''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ## Background {{Description|A young woman steps up to the edge of the cliff and peers down wearing an amused grin. She fingers the curve of a long hunting bow.}} Kipeha is a Mataru of the Wahaki tribe, tasked with protecting the village. Anyone who wants to get in needs to go through her first. ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = Supplies, food, and ingredients. Also sells the unique [Kuaru's Prize](/kuarusPrize/). |stronghold = |rest = yes |quests_started = |quests_involved = * [Fruitful Alliance](/fruitfulAlliance/) * [Tip of the Spear](/tipOfTheSpear/) |none = |other = * Anyone who seeks to get into the village needs to get through her. See [Ori o Koīki](/oriOKoiki/) for details. * You can ask her to examine the [Infested Koīki](/infestedKoiki/) fruit. She will warn you not to eat it, as the wood-strangling wasps have planted their larvae within the fruit. Doing so would be fatal. }} [Category:Ori o Koīki characters](/categoryOriOKoikiCharacters/)

She fingers the curve of a long hunting bow.}} Kipeha is a Mataru of the Wahaki tribe, tasked with protecting the village. Anyone who wants to get in needs to go through her first. ==Interactions== {{Interactions |companion = |wares = Supplies, food, and ingredients.
